Token.Abstract: A collection of category extensions for NSURL that provide direct access to built-in app capabilites.
Returns the URL to open the mobile app store on the app's page.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The application identifier that gets assigned to a new app when you add it to iTunes Connect.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns the URL to the direct app store link

Token.Abstract: Returns the URL to open the mobile app store on the app's review page.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The application identifier that gets assigned to a new app when you add it to iTunes Connect.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns the URL to the direct app store link
